mapper.select: INSERT INTO write_KnowBoard (SEQ, R_SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, POSTINGDATE, SUBJECT, PICTURE, HITS , STATE) VALUES ( TB_KNOWBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 0, #{title}, 'writer', #{content}, sysdate, #{subject}, 'picture', 0, 'Y' )

INSERT INTO mod_KnowBoard ( CNT , SEQ, R_SEQ, R_TITLE, R_CONTENT, R_REPOSTINGTDATE, R_SUBJECT, R_PICTURE )
SELECT TB_MOD_KNOWBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SEQ, 1, TITLE, CONTENT, POSTINGDATE, SUBJECT, PICTURE
SELECT TB_MOD_KNOWBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SEQ, (R_SEQ + 1), TITLE, CONTENT, POSTINGDATE, SUBJECT, PICTURE
FROM write_KnowBoard WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT * FROM write_KnowBoard WHERE state = 'Y' ORDER BY seq

INSERT INTO commentWrite_KnowBoard (COMMENT_ID, SEQ, NICKNAME, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, COMMENT_STATE) VALUES ( TB_COM_WRI_KNOWBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{seq}, #{nickname}, #{comment_content}, sysdate, 'Y' )
SELECT * FROM commentWrite_KnowBoard WHERE seq = #{seq} ORDER BY COMMENT_ID
SELECT * FROM commentWrite_KnowBoard WHERE seq = #{seq} AND COMMENT_ID = (SELECT MAX(COMMENT_ID) FROM commentWrite_KnowBoard WHERE seq = #{seq}) ORDER BY COMMENT_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM write_KnowBoard WHERE subject = #{value} AND state = 'Y' ORDER BY seq
